title: Create fantasy sports platform with team management and contests

requirements.text: Implement user registration and authentication system allowing users to sign up and log in securely using Internet Identity
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register new accounts via Internet Identity
Users can log in and log out successfully
Authentication state persists across page refreshes
Unauthenticated users are redirected to login

requirements.text: Create a player database storing athlete information including name, team, position, current form, and base price
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores player records with all required attributes
Players can be retrieved by position or team
Player data includes realistic sports attributes

requirements.text: Build fantasy team creation interface where users can select players from different positions within a budget constraint
acceptanceCriteria: Users can browse available players filtered by position
Team formation shows selected players by position (e.g., 1 goalkeeper, 4 defenders, 3 midfielders, 3 forwards)
Running budget total updates as players are added or removed
Users cannot exceed budget limit
Save team button stores the fantasy team

requirements.text: Implement backend logic to save and retrieve user fantasy teams with validation for budget limits and position constraints
acceptanceCriteria: Teams are stored with user ID, player IDs, and creation timestamp
Validation prevents teams exceeding budget
Validation enforces position requirements
Users can retrieve their saved teams

requirements.text: Create contest/league system allowing users to join competitions with entry fees and prize pools
acceptanceCriteria: Users can view available contests with entry fee and prize details
Users can join contests with their fantasy team
Contest capacity limits are enforced
Contest status shows participant count

requirements.text: Implement points scoring system that calculates fantasy team scores based on player performance metrics (goals, assists, clean sheets, etc.)
acceptanceCriteria: Points are calculated based on predefined scoring rules
Different actions award different points (e.g., goal = 10 points, assist = 5 points)
Team total score aggregates all player scores
Scores update when match results are recorded

requirements.text: Build leaderboard display showing contest rankings with user teams sorted by total points
acceptanceCriteria: Leaderboard shows rank, username, team name, and total points
Current user's position is highlighted
Rankings update based on latest scores
Top performers are prominently displayed

requirements.text: Integrate Stripe payment system for contest entry fee payments
acceptanceCriteria: Users can pay entry fees via Stripe checkout
Payment confirmation triggers contest entry
Failed payments prevent contest entry
Payment records are stored with user ID and contest ID

requirements.text: Implement wallet system for managing user balance, tracking deposits, entry fees, and winnings
acceptanceCriteria: Each user has a wallet with current balance
Wallet displays transaction history (deposits, entry fees, winnings)
Users can add funds to wallet via Stripe
Contest entry deducts from wallet balance
Winnings are automatically credited to wallet

requirements.text: Design and apply a modern, sporty visual theme with vibrant colors (greens and oranges), bold typography, and card-based layouts suitable for a competitive fantasy sports platform
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses energetic sports-themed colors
Typography is bold and readable for data-heavy displays
Layout uses cards for players, contests, and leaderboards
Design conveys competition and excitement
Visual hierarchy emphasizes key actions and information

constraints: Use Internet Identity for authentication, not third-party OAuth providers
Payment processing must use Stripe integration only
All user data and game state must be stored in the Motoko backend
No real-time WebSocket features for live score updates
nonGoals: Mobile native app development (focus on responsive web app)
Integration with actual sports APIs for live match data
Multi-sport support (focus on single sport initially)

required: Fantasy sports hero banner with dynamic athletes and stadium atmosphere (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Trophy icon for contest winners in metallic gold style (trophy-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Player card placeholder silhouette for athlete profiles (player-placeholder.dim_200x200.png)
